summary: A collection of geometry and neural network utilities for Neural Radiance Field (NeRF) models, offering mesh extraction via Deep Marching Tetrahedra, core MLP and residual layers, a base class with sampling and volume rendering helpers, and two NeRF implementations that use TCNN or Torch‑NGP positional encodings for efficient 3D scene representation.
business_intent: Enable developers to integrate high‑performance, modular NeRF components into multimodal AI products for realistic 3D view synthesis, virtual reality, augmented reality, and other applications requiring neural rendering of complex scenes.
